name: DEX (itch)
description:
DEX (Español)

La tierra esta siendo invadida por robots extraterrestres, tu único lugar a salvo es tu refugio, defiéndelo con tu ametralladora hasta que todo termine!

Toda critica constructiva es bienvenida! :D

DEX (Ingles)

The earth is being invaded by extraterrestrial robots, your only safe place is your refuge, defend it with your machine gun until it is all over!

Tutorial:
Use mouse to shoot.

All constructive criticism is welcome :)
